ultimate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someoneâ€™s ultimate aim is their main and most important aim, that they hope to achieve in the future
ultimate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Complete disarmament was the ultimate goal of the conference.
Our ultimate objective is to have as many female members of parliament as there are male.
ultimate.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the ultimate result of a long process is what happens at the end of it
ultimate.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The ultimate outcome of the experiment cannot be predicted.
The ultimate fate of the tribe was even sadder.
the ultimate failure of the project
ultimate.translation[0].definitions[2].d: if you have ultimate responsibility for something, you are the person who must make the important final decisions about it
ultimate.translation[0].definitions[2].e: The ultimate responsibility for policy lies with the president.
The ultimate decision rests with the Public Health Service.
ultimate.translation[0].definitions[3].d: better, bigger, worse etc than all other things or people of the same kind
ultimate.translation[0].definitions[3].e: The Rolling Stones are the ultimate rock and roll band.
The female nude is surely the ultimate test of artistic skill.
